description:
When the crowds are too much, these splitboard boots set you up for backcountry goodness. Designed in collaboration with legendary backcountry shredder Jeremy Jones, the TM-2 combine mountaineering-boot versatility with snowboard-specific details. Hiking is a fact of life when sniffing out backcountry lines, so the hybrid Walk Mode collar makes skinning more comfortable. The laces are covered to keep them from freezing, and a burly toe cap provides plenty of protection for booting and kicking steps.

  • Fully taped interior seams and weather-resistant gaiter offer excellent waterproofing
  • Hybrid Walk-mode collar releases via a simple strap for comfortable hiking and skinning
  • Performance liners use High dual density foam for energy transfer and damping
  • Rigid back stay adds support
  • Performance insole has molded evolution foam for support and cushioning
  • Heel Hold System uses removable inserts to customize fit
  • Water-resistant 3D molded tongue ensures an even flex
  • Molded toe cap is made of light, strong and durable TPU
  • Versatile medium flex
  • Vibram® soles feature a traditional and grippy mountaineering tread
  • Heel welt on outsole is compatible with strap or semi-automatic crampons
name: ThirtyTwo TM-2 Jones '21 Snowboard Boots - Unisex
